Text: Comes up after about 15 mins that it is not authorised for this device (PS3) and mutes the sound. What a disappointment!
It seems this is a new DRM called Cinavia. Hope someone can find a work around soon. I have copied the HD file to dvd and will try it in the Xbox 360 tonight. Fingers crossed!

Quality is good; however, I cannot seem to find a version that has either embedded subs or a separate .srt file for the non-English parts. At the very least, there are two scenes in the beginning that would warranty this. If anyone has come across this, please comment.
